plot: This short experimental film is a celebration of the art and joy of mark making and the animated line. A line on a page creating a line on a page.
title: Life Line
plot_es: This short experimental film is a celebration of the art and joy of mark making and the animated line. A line on a page creating a line on a page.
plot_en: This short experimental film is a celebration of the art and joy of mark making and the animated line. A line on a page creating a line on a page.
